prTitle: feat: create base HTML5 document structure
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented the base HTML5 document structure for the simple spaghetti website as specified in task-simple-spaghetti-website-feat-html-document-structure-1.

### Changes Made

- **Fixed title**: Changed from "Test Pizza Page" to "I Love Spagheeti"
- **Fixed content**: Changed from "I love pizza" to "I love spagheeti" 
- **Removed CSS**: Eliminated all inline styling (`style="background-color: red;"` and `style="background-color: blue;"`)
- **Removed unnecessary elements**: Removed the `<footer>` element
- **Maintained HTML5 compliance**: Proper DOCTYPE declaration and element nesting
- **Optimized file size**: Reduced from 202 bytes to 117 bytes (well under 250 byte requirement)

### Validation Results

✅ Valid HTML5 DOCTYPE declaration  
✅ Proper html, head, and body element structure  
✅ Title tag contains "I Love Spagheeti" as specified  
✅ Body contains "I love spagheeti" text as specified  
✅ No CSS styling (inline or external)  
✅ No JavaScript (inline or external)  
✅ File size under 250 bytes (117 bytes actual)  
✅ Only required elements present

The implementation now fully meets the requirements specified in the PRD and LLD documentation.

Closes #1
